name: 吳修明
objective:
定性之隨機系統、定性及隨機系統參數估計、定性及隨機系統之適應預測、線性定性及隨機系統之適應控制。
Deterministic and Stochastic system, Parameter Estimation of Deterministic and Stochastic systems, Adaptive Estimation of Deterministic and Stochastic systems, Adaptive Controls of Linear Deterministic and Stochastic Systems.
schedule:
Week 1. What is adaptive control?
Week 2~4 Real-time parameter estimation
Week 5~8 Deterministic self-tuning regulators
Week 9  Midterm project
Week 10~12 Stochastic and predictive self-tuning regulators
Week 13~15 Model-reference adaptive systems
Week 16-17 Properties of adaptive systems
Week 18 Final project
